content:
It was a pleasant day in Murderville (Population 12). The sun was shining, the birds were singing, and everything was right in the world. Everyone, all twelve people, were out in the park enjoying the nice weather. The day just couldn’t get better, when...

“Someone’s been murdered!”

Everyone rushed over to see what’s happened. Laying on a bench, in the middle of the park, was John Smith, with a bullet wound in his chest.

Group hysteria set in immediately.

“Who could’ve done this?”

“I think I’m going to be sick!”

“Murderville is such a good neighborhood! How could this happen?”


The population was down by eight percent that day, and the tension in the town was at an all time high. Perhaps they should’ve had a police force. Never the less, some sweet, sweet, justice was about to go down. The town set up the old hangin’ tree (it was a darker time), and put up some rope. It’s time for Murderville (Population 11) to put matters into their own hands.

Rules

1. Site-wide rules apply.
2. In all interactions with the moderator, you must be honest.
3. Don’t do anything that would be considered cheating.
4. Don’t quote your role PM, take a screenshot of it, etc. You may only paraphrase it.
5. Do not attempt to use a system of robust cryptography, etc. Do not use small or invisible text to attempt to avoid detection.
6. If you go 72 hours without a post, I’ll send you an official prod. If you go 48 hours without a post, a player may request an unofficial prod on you. If you get three official prods, I’ll replace you. If you don’t respond to a prod after 48 hours, I’ll replace you.
7. Try to keep the activity level up so the game doesn’t stall out.
8. If you know you’re going to be absent a period of time, please tell me ahead of time.
9. Each player gets a single vote to use during the day that they may change as many times as they wish to vote for any player.
10. When a majority of players are voting for a certain player, that player is "lynched" and removed from the game.
11. Players may vote for "No Lynch." If at least half of the players vote for a "No Lynch," the day ends without a lynch.
12. Game days will last up to three weeks. If a vote hasn’t been decided in that time, a “No Lynch” will occur.
13. Don’t discuss this game elsewhere, and don’t discuss other ongoing games in here.
14. I may not have covered everything. If something comes up, I will handle it at my discretion.
15. Feel free to PM me if you have any concerns.
16. Days will last two weeks, and nights will last three days. If a day meets the deadline and a lynch hasn't occurred, you lose that day's lynch.
17. To prevent meta gaming, if a killing role doesn't submit their kill, I'll randomize it.
18. I have final say.

Sample VT Role PM:

You are a Vanilla Townie.
During the day you may use your vote to find the scum.

You are aligned with the town. You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. Please confirm by sending me a PM with your role name and alignment. The game thread is here.

PM's will go out shortly.

PM's are out. The game will start when I get 9 out of 11 confirmations.
Unlocking the thread. Pre-game is over, Day 1 has begun!

Set-up:
2 Mafia Encryptors

8 Vanilla Townies

Role PMs:

You are a 1-Shot Bulletproof Neighborizer.
During the day you may use your vote to find the scum.
Every night, you may recruit one person for your neighborhood. You will be able to talk to this person in a quick topic here. You may talk during the day and during the night. This person retains their alignment and role, so they aren’t necessarily town aligned. If you don’t submit an action by the night deadline, you won't recruit anyone.

You are aligned with the town. You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. Please confirm by sending me a PM with your role name and alignment. The game thread is here.


You are a Vanilla Townie.
During the day you may use your vote to find the scum.

You are aligned with the town. You win if all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one town-aligned player is alive. Please confirm by sending me a PM with your role name and alignment. The game thread is here.


You and [Partner] are Mafia Encryptors.
During the day you should try to blend in and attempt to mislynch town players.
During both the day phase and the night phase, you may talk to your partner in a quicktopic located here. Every night, you may choose one player to kill. You must send the nightkill to me via private message before the night deadline. If you do not send in a kill before the deadline, I will choose the kill randomly.

You are aligned with the mafia. You win if at least one member of your group is alive and all other players are dead (or if nothing can prevent the same). Please confirm by sending me a PM with your role name and alignment. The game thread is here.
